meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indigestible.
meanings.sent1: The indigestibility of the rock made it impossible for the animal to eat.
meanings.sent2: The high fiber content of the food contributed to its indigestibility.
meanings.sent3: The indigestibility of the rubber band left the curious puppy puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The indigestibility of the truth weighed heavily on his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The indigestibility of the puzzle piece made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the patient's indigestibility was due to a food allergy.
meanings.sent2: The indigestibility of certain foods can lead to stomach discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The indigestibility of the joke left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her indigestibility of criticism hindered her personal growth.
meanings.sent5: The indigestibility of the situation made it hard to swallow for everyone involved.
